SEARCH
Package smarthome.controller

Class DeviceTypeRESTController

java.lang.Object
smarthome.controller.DeviceTypeRESTController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/devicetypes") public class DeviceTypeRESTController extends Object
REST Controller for managing device types. This controller provides endpoints for interacting with device types.
